sentences.en: Give a lark to catch a kite.
He got the part, and eventually decided the acting lark wasn't half bad.
sentences.cn: 他赢得了那个角色，一番考虑后觉得演戏这玩意儿感觉也还不错。

sentences.en: He thinks it cruel to confine a lark in a cage.
sentences.cn: 他认为把云雀关在笼子里太残忍了.

sentences.en: He was in his native element and as happy as a lark.
He was sure she must be doing newspaper work as a lark.
sentences.cn: 他觉得毫无疑问,她一定为了消愁解闷才做新闻工作的.

sentences.en: He'd made it seem rather a lark, to be visiting a supposedly haunted house.
sentences.cn: 他把到一间据说闹鬼的屋子探访说得好像多有意思似的。

sentences.en: It sounds like the singing of lark birds.
sentences.cn: 这歌声就像百灵鸟一样清脆。

sentences.en: It would be a lark to show him off to her friends.
sentences.cn: 带着他到她的朋友们那里去显耀显耀,这该多有趣呀.

sentences.en: Only the little lark never sang.
sentences.cn: 不过这只百灵鸟从来不歌唱。

sentences.en: Paint the whole room? Sod that for a lark!
sentences.cn: 油漆整个房间？ 开什么玩笑！

sentences.en: She lived in the village with her grandparents as cheerful as a lark.
sentences.cn: 她同祖父母一起住在乡间非常快活.

sentences.en: Snap dragons , calceolaria and lark spur will drop their florets rapidly.
sentences.cn: 金鱼草,蒲包花和翠雀花的小花将迅速脱落.

sentences.en: The boys didn't mean any harm—they just did it for a lark.
sentences.cn: 那些男孩并无恶意—他们只是闹着玩罢了。

sentences.en: The chances are that the thief will be under 21 and doing it for a lark.
sentences.cn: 偷东西的很可能是个不到21岁的年轻人，干这事儿只是贪玩。

sentences.en: The children thought it was a great lark.
The swallow flies high, the lark flies higher, the eagle flies highest.
sentences.cn: 燕子飞得高, 云雀飞得更高, 鹰飞得最高.

sentences.en: There was no after - theatre lark, however, so far as Carrie was concerned.
sentences.cn: 然而, 就嘉莉而言,不存在什么散场后的玩乐.

sentences.en: They stole the car for a lark, but now they're in trouble.
sentences.cn: 他们偷了汽车原以为好玩, 现在可惹祸了.

trans.tran_cn: 云雀，百灵鸟，<口>玩笑，嬉戏
trans.tran_en: a small brown singing bird with long pointed wings
to have a good time by frolicking
